page.title: 05MOST POPULAR TV PROGRAMMES
page.content: Recently we did a survey on the most popular T.V. programmes watched by the children in Belle Vale school.These are the top five programmes. {1."THE YOUNG ONES" (COMEDY BBC2) is the most popular programme on T.V. It is about four crazy students. It is really an adult programme. {2."BROOKSIDE" (SOAP OPERA,CHANNEL4)}is on twice a week & is set on Mersyside. The main families involved are the Grants & the Colins. {3."DALLAS" (AMERICAN SOAP OPERA)}is set in Dallas U.S.A. It is about two oil merchants,the Ewings & the Barnes. {4."DOGTANIAN" (CARTOON BBC1)}is about a dog whose ambition is to become a member of the Royal Muskerhounds. {5."HUNTER" (I.T.V)}is set in America and is about two detectives called Hunter & Macall.It is an exciting programme and is full of action.
